org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.bulk

Class BulkTransportClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.BaseTransportClient
      • org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.BaseIngestTransportClient
        • org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.bulk.BulkTransportClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Feed, Ingest

    public class BulkTransportClient
extends BaseIngestTransportClient
implements Ingest
    Client using the BulkProcessor of Elasticsearch
